== Changes ==

Here are some of the new and updated parts in WordPress 2.0

* New TinyMCE Editor WYSIWIG
* Import posts from RSS, Textpattern, Blogger, Movable Type
* Image/File Uploading
* User Metadata
* User Roles and Capabilities
* Presentation Page Changes
* Improved Administration abilities via AJAX
* Persistent Cache
* Database Versioning
* Theme preview via thumbnail (screenshot.png)
* WordPress Database Backup Plugin
* Akismet Spam Filter Plugin
* New Hooks for Developers
* Improved Import Functionality
* Post Preview
* Theme Header Customization
* Theme Function Ability 
* Improved Posting speed
